author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
1. Invite @User to mod a guild
2. Exile @User
3. Have @User accept the invite

This seems like a bug since you normally can not exile guildmasters.
body_html:
1. Invite @User to mod a guild
  2. Exile @User
  3. Have @User accept the invite

This seems like a bug since you normally can not exile guildmasters.

guild.description:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file _bugs_. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.description_html:
See a bug while using Ruqqus? File it here and we'll open an issue for the Ruqqus devs to resolve. Before posting, look around first to see if the bug hasn't already been filed. If so, just upvote it or leave a comment to show your support. When a bug is resolved, the status will be reported back in the original thread.

Please only use this guild to file bugs. For suggestions or feature requests, use +Ruqqus or +BetaFeedback.
guild.name: RuqqusBugs

title: Exiled users can accept guildmaster invites

body:
While we're on the subject, why do I not get a notification when someone accepts/declines my invite? 

While we're on the subject, why can I not include a 50char message along with the invite?
body_html:
While we're on the subject, why do I not get a notification when someone accepts/declines my invite?

While we're on the subject, why can I not include a 50char message along with the invite?
